markdownRemark.html: Matt Woodward and Peter J. Farrell over at the ColdFusion Weekly podcast covered in great detail some of the more popular design patterns. If you are a ColdFusion programmer interested in Object Oriented design patterns, this episode is must listen. Keep up the good work Matt and Peter.

frontmatter.title: ColdFusion Weekly 1.1 Podcast Covers Design Patterns
ColdFusion Product Manager Jason Delmore Cut from Adobe
